import "./AddEventForm.css"; import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Form, Col, Row, Button, FloatingLabel, FormControl, } from "react-bootstrap"; const AddEventForm = (props) => { const [validated, setValidated] = useState(false); const enteredSport = useRef(); const enteredLevel = useRef(); const enteredNrOfPlayers = useRef(); const enteredLvlRequirement = useRef(); const enteredCity = useRef(); const enteredLocation = useRef(); const enteredDate = useRef(); const enteredTime = useRef(); const enteredDescription = useRef(); const handleSubmit = (event) => { const form = event.currentTarget; if (form.checkValidity() === false) { event.preventDefault(); console.log("FALSE") setValidated(false); } else { event.preventDefault(); console.log("FALSE") console.log("true") } if(validated){ event.preventDefault(); const newEvent = { enteredSport : enteredSport.current.value, enteredLevel: enteredLevel.current.value, enteredNrPlayers : enteredNrOfPlayers.current.value, enteredLvlRequirement : enteredLvlRequirement.current.value, enteredCity : enteredCity.current.value, enteredLocation : enteredLocation.current.value, enteredDate : enteredDate.current.value, enteredTime : enteredTime.current.value, enteredDescription : enteredDescription.current.value, }; console.log(newEvent) } }; return (
Choose a sport Please provide a valid sport. Choose a level Please provide a level. Nr of players including you Please provide an appropriate nr of players(including you). Level Requirement Please provide level requirement. City Please provide a valid city. You can specify a place Start date of the event Please provide start date Start time Please provide start time
); }; export default AddEventForm;
